overview:
Steve Moss has more than 20 years experience in both traditional media and new media companies, both in North America and in Asia. Prior to joining evri, Moss served as Vice President, Sales and Services for Corbis Corporation, Bill Gates’ privately held digital media and licensing company. Before joining Corbis, Moss was General Manager of North America Field Sales with Microsoftâ€™s MSN division.

Moss spent 10 years in the Asia Pacific region, most recently as CEO of DoubleClick Asia, where he was responsible for launching the DoubleClick network in six countries throughout Southeast Asia. Prior to DoubleClick, Moss was Vice President and Managing Director of BusinessWeek.
